description: Just as comforting and essential as the GORP in your snack bag, the Trail Mix Snap Pullover will follow you through each chapter of your adventure planning. What sets this fleece apart from the rest is its thermo-regulating ActiveTemp™ treatment, built to keep you cool, dry, and comfortable through any activity. Hiking, climbing, bonfire-ing, cabin weekend-ing, the Trail Mix is destined to do it all.
name: Outdoor Research Trail Mix Snap Pullover - Mens
